name: dppExtension
description: Device extension schema for Wi-Fi Easy Connect / Device Provisioning Protocol (DPP)

attributes.name: dppVersion
attributes.description: Version of DPP this device supports.

attributes.name: bootstrappingMethod
attributes.description: The list of all the bootstrapping methods available on the enrollee device. For example, [QR, NFC].

attributes.name: bootstrapKey
attributes.description: This key is Elliptic-Curve Diffieâ€“Hellman (ECDH) public key. The base64 encoded length for P-256, P-384, and P-521 is 80, 96, and 120 characters.

attributes.name: deviceMacAddress
attributes.description: A unique public MAC address assigned by the manufacturer.

attributes.name: classChannel
attributes.description: A list of global operating class and channel shared as bootstrapping information. It is formatted as class/channel. For example, '81/1', '115/36'.

attributes.name: serialNumber
attributes.description: An alphanumeric serial number that may also be passed as bootstrapping information.
